availability.licence: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

body.ab:
County of Madison
STATE OF NEW YORK.
CERTIFICATE OF DEATH.
In the Town of Smithfield
1. Full Name of Deceased W George Colvin
2. Age 36 years No months 21 days. Sex M Color
3. Married 4. Occupation Laborer
5. Birthplace Cazenovia NY
6. Father’s Name and Birthplace James Colvin (State or Country) Ireland
7. Mother’s Name and Birthplace Henrietta (Cranston) Colvin (State or Country) New York
8. Place of Death Brothers residence Jas Colvin (How long resident here.) 4 weeks (If dying away from Home, give Home Residence below) Oneida Castle, NY
9. Date and Hour of Death:—Died on the 1 day of Mch 1894, at about 1015 A.M.
10. I hereby report this Death, and certify that the foregoing statements are true according to the best of my knowledge.
(Signature and residence of Reporter) James Colvin Siloam N.Y.
11. I Hereby Certify, That I attended the deceased from Feb 9 1894, to Mch 1 1894, that I last saw
him March 2d 1894, that he died on the 1st day of March 1894, about 1015 o’clock A.M., and that to the
best of my knowledge and belief the Cause of his death was as hereunder written:
Cause of Causes of Death.
Chief and Determining} Cancer of Stomach not known duration
Witness my hand this 3 day of March 1894.
(Signature,) F E Dewey M.D.
Residence, Peterboro N.Y.
Place of Burial Oneida Castle NY
Date of Burial Mch 3d 1894
of Undertaker E B French Oneida NY
